message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives you a good chunk while ensuring I get a larger share.
I believe this split is fairer, giving us both a significant portion.  Let's work towards a solution that benefits us both.
Bob, my offer is decreasing.  Time is running out and we both lose with every round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's find a middle ground before the value of the money diminishes further.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
